title: How do I set a custom audio file as the ringtone or notification tone?
answer:
Touch File Manager. Press and hold an audio file and choose Set as > Phone ringtone or Notification ringtone. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110599) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110600)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110601)

 If the music file that you choose as the ringtone is stored on the microSD card, the default ringtone is used again if the microSD card is removed. (This is not the case if you choose the MTP mode.)
